titleStmt.title: The geometrical sea-man: or, the art of navigation performed by geometry. Shewing how all the three kinds of sayling, viz. by the plain chart, by Mercators chart, by a great circle. may be easily and exactly performed by a plain ruler and a pair of compasses, without arithmeticall calculation. / By Henry Phillippes.
titleStmt.author: Phillippes, Henry, d. 1677?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert and William Leybourn, for George Hurlock, and are to be sold at his shop at Magnus Church-corner,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The second "1" in imprint is crossed out and altered to "1651"; "Febr. 1.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
